com.cubeia.firebase.api.plugin.sysinfo
Interface SystemInfoQueryService

All Superinterfaces:
Contract
public interface SystemInfoQueryService
extends Contract

Plugin interface for service that will handle all system info request actions sent by clients. The implementing service will execute locally on the same node as the client.

Author:
Fredrik Johansson, Cubeia Ltd

Method Summary
 SystemInfoResponseAction appendResponseData(SystemInfoResponseAction action)
          Handle a system info query request.
 

Method Detail

appendResponseData

SystemInfoResponseAction appendResponseData(SystemInfoResponseAction action)
Handle a system info query request. This will be called in an asynchronously manner in order to keep (possible) distributed calls from blocking the gateway's IO threads. The response action will be prepopulated with all fields except parameters. If you change a defined field (e.g. players) then this change will propagate to the client.

Parameters:
action, - the prepopulated response action
Returns:
A new or the modified system info response action
